BackstoryDef.title: Chieftain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the chief of [PAWN_possessive] tribe unit it was wiped out by raiders. Now [PAWN_pronoun] wanders the Rimworld waiting for a chance at revenge.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval lord
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a noble lord. [PAWN_pronoun] has decided to wander the rimworld to test [PAWN_possessive] mettle against this harsh world before returning to lead [PAWN_possessive] people.

BackstoryDef.title: Senator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an exiled senator. [PAWN_possessive] political enemies came for [PAWN_objective] one night and [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to flee. [PAWN_pronoun] hopes to build a following on this new world and return for vengeance when possible.

BackstoryDef.title: Gang leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an urbworld gang leader. [PAWN_pronoun] left his crew behind when [PAWN_pronoun] was betrayed. [PAWN_nameDef] hopes to start a new gang on this forsaken world and rise to be its crime kingpin.

BackstoryDef.title: Governor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a governor on this rimworld until his colony was overrun by raiders. Now [PAWN_pronoun] wanders the Rimworld waiting for a chance at revenge.

BackstoryDef.title: Union boss
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a union boss on a caveworld. [PAWN_pronoun] has decided to dedicate [PAWN_possessive] life to supporting the rights of the workers in the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a combat engineer. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to build structures as well as how to tear them down. Now [PAWN_nameDef] has decided to put [PAWN_possessive] skills to use helping to build and defend a colony on the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Sheriff
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a sheriff of the outer rim. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for enforcing the loose semblance of law that this world has.

BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an urbworld assassin dedicated to eliminating [PAWN_possessive] targets. [PAWN_pronoun] has tracked one of them to this rimworld and [PAWN_pronoun] will kill anyone who gets in [PAWN_possessive] way.

BackstoryDef.title: Trapper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal trapper in charge of bringing food to [PAWN_possessive] tribe until one day [PAWN_pronoun] was the one who was trapped and sold off to the highest bidder. Now [PAWN_nameDef] is far from home.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval archer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Medieval archer. Tired of war [PAWN_pronoun] hung up [PAWN_possessive] bow and snuck aboard a spaceship. Now [PAWN_nameDef] utilizes [PAWN_possessive] talents defending and feeding the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Drop pod trooper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a glitterworld drop pod trooper. A machine of death and destruction [PAWN_pronoun] saw the end of many worlds. Now after many years of destroying [PAWN_pronoun] has traveled to the outer rim to help build something.

BackstoryDef.title: Medicine man
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal medicine man. [PAWN_pronoun] was exiled from [PAWN_possessive] tribe for [PAWN_possessive] outlandish ideas and now travels the outer rim healing those [PAWN_pronoun] comes across.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval alchemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was exiled from [PAWN_possessive] lord's court when [PAWN_pronoun] failed to turn lead into gold. Now [PAWN_nameDef] travels the outer rim searching for a greater understanding of the elements.

BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld surgeon
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a glitterworld surgeon. [PAWN_pronoun] saved countless lives. However [PAWN_nameDef] knew that [PAWN_pronoun] could do more good somewhere lacking a doctor with [PAWN_possessive] skills, so he traveled to the outer rim to make a real difference.

BackstoryDef.title: Black market butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a black market butcher. [PAWN_pronoun] deals with reclaiming organs from illegal sources for a variety of purposes. [PAWN_nameDef] has traveled to the outer rim to avoid the long reach of the law.

BackstoryDef.title: Field medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a field medic, able to save lives in even the roughest environments. There are few proper hospitals in the outer rim so [PAWN_nameDef] has learned to triage and treat patients in the field. Due to the lawlessness of the outer rim [PAWN_pronoun] has also learned how to use a gun.

BackstoryDef.title: Fungus cultivator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is fungus cultivator, a grower of food and medicine for his caveworld. [PAWN_pronoun] knows which mushrooms heal, which mushrooms are tasty and which mushrooms kill.

BackstoryDef.title: Weaver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal weaver. While [PAWN_possessive] crafts are primitive nobody can deny [PAWN_possessive] artistic talents.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval sculptor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is medieval sculptor. [PAWN_pronoun] assists in the building of grand buildings and [PAWN_possessive] statues are famous across [PAWN_possessive] home world. Now [PAWN_nameDef] tours the outer rim leaving [PAWN_possessive] mark on this wild, untamed place.

BackstoryDef.title: Holographic designer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is glitterworld holographic designer. [PAWN_pronoun] creates amazing holographic pieces of art that are famous across the galaxy. Looking for inspiration [PAWN_nameDef] has traveled to the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Graffiti artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an urbworld graffiti artist. [PAWN_pronoun] is almost as skilled with a gun as [PAWN_pronoun] is with a spray-can as tagging rival territory is dangerous business. [PAWN_nameDef] has decided to leave his mark on the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Taxidermist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an taxidermist in the outer rim. [PAWN_pronoun] takes animal carcasses and turns them into stunning works of art.

BackstoryDef.title: Cave painter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a cave painter. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] time creating brilliant pieces of art on his caveworld. However only very few of the inhabitants of his home world has an appreciation for art. [PAWN_nameDef] left for the outer rim to seize the acknowledgment for [PAWN_possessive] craft [PAWN_pronoun] has always known [PAWN_pronoun] deserves.

BackstoryDef.title: Hunter and gatherer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a hunter and gatherer responsible for supplying [PAWN_possessive] tribe with a diverse range of foods. One day [PAWN_pronoun] returned to find [PAWN_possessive] people slaughtered by raiders. Now [PAWN_nameDef] seeks vengeance.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medieval farmer. Although [PAWN_pronoun] was a very capable grower [PAWN_nameDef] always knew that [PAWN_pronoun] was destined for more. Now [PAWN_pronoun] lends [PAWN_possessive] hands in taming the wild outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Horticulture expert
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a horticulture expert on [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld. Creating gardens was as much an art-form there as a practical pursuit. Now [PAWN_nameDef] seeks to spread beauty and greenery across the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Smokeleaf cultivator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the best smokeleaf cultivators on [PAWN_possessive] crowded urbworld. Eventually a rival organization threatened his life and he fled to the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Farming the outer rim is as dangerous an occupation as any. [PAWN_nameDef] has survived animal attacks, raiders and crop failures. [PAWN_pronoun] continues to try to eek out a living on this harsh planet.

BackstoryDef.title: Bug breeder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Farms on a caveworld look very different to farms on most other worlds. Caveworld growers like [PAWN_nameDef] need to be able to grow a large variety of lichens and mosses to breed bugs for protein. [PAWN_nameDef] has decided to explore the outer rim to find new plants and insects to take back to [PAWN_possessive] home world one day.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal scout. [PAWN_pronoun] is responsible for searching out new lands and new ideas, before bringing them back to the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] has learned a variety of skills to act independently while away from [PAWN_possessive] tribe. One day [PAWN_nameDef] will return to [PAWN_possessive] tribal world with [PAWN_possessive] new knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval inventor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] constantly pushed the boundaries of scientific achievement on [PAWN_possessive] home world, inventing many ingenious contraptions. Eventually though [PAWN_pronoun] knew that in order to learn more he would have to pack up [PAWN_possessive] workshop and travel the stars. Now [PAWN_nameDef] experiments in the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Theoretical scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very deep knowledge of complex scientific concepts. A true genius, [PAWN_pronoun] has decided that in order to further [PAWN_possessive] knowledge [PAWN_pronoun] needs to explore the very limits of civilization. Whether [PAWN_nameDef] will survive or not, only time will tell.

BackstoryDef.title: Chemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the creation of many medical and recreational drugs on [PAWN_possessive] crowded urbworld. Eventually [PAWN_nameDef] decided to explore the outer rim to find even more potent reagents for [PAWN_possessive] concoctions.

BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The resources required to fabricate new technology are sometimes hard to come by in the outer rim. [PAWN_nameDef] takes existing inventions and tinkers with them to discover improvements. [PAWN_pronoun] has almost blown [PAWN_objective]self up on multiple occasions.

BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for researching the different rock and mineral types on [PAWN_possessive] caveworld. Now [PAWN_pronoun] explores the geology of the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Digger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal digger. [PAWN_pronoun] was responsible for moving large amounts of earth in order to create primitive buildings or farmland.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a miner on his medieval home world. [PAWN_pronoun] is comfortable deep within the earth, pick in hand. [PAWN_nameDef] has traveled to the outer rim to strike it rich.

BackstoryDef.title: Asteroid excavator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an asteroid excavator, shattering asteroids for [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld to get to the precious resources inside. Now [PAWN_nameDef] uses [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of minerals to exploit planets on the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Sewer runner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a sewer runner on [PAWN_possessive] crowded urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] ran through the underground tunnels underneath the cities exploring. Now [PAWN_pronoun] uses [PAWN_possessive] talents to help explore the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Prospector
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a prospector of the outer rim. [PAWN_possessive] job is to find and exploit valuable mineral deposits.

BackstoryDef.title: Tunneler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tunneler on his caveworld home. [PAWN_pronoun] was a natural at tunneling beneath the surface and scouting out valuable minerals. Now [PAWN_nameDef] lends his experience to colonies on the outer rim for coin.

BackstoryDef.title: Fire tender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal fire tender. The position of fire tender is highly valued in tribal society for fires multitude of uses.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval butcher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medieval butcher. [PAWN_pronoun] knows [PAWN_possessive] way around a cleaver which is both useful in the kitchen and on the battlefield.

BackstoryDef.title: Gastronomical artisan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a gastronomical artisan. [PAWN_pronoun] turned cooking into an art form on [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld home.

BackstoryDef.title: Brewer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an urbworld brewer. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to make a variety of different alcoholic beverages, a highly sought after skill in the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Frontier chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a frontier chef in the outer rim. [PAWN_pronoun] cooks delicious meals, just don't ask what's in them!

BackstoryDef.title: Nutrient paste cook
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a nutrient paste cook for [PAWN_possessive] caveworld home. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to cook meals from limited ingredients that while not delicious can sustain a person.

BackstoryDef.title: Hut maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal hut maker. [PAWN_pronoun] explores the rimworld in the search of better building techniques for [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval mason
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medieval mason. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to construct beautiful stone structures.

BackstoryDef.title: High rise architect
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a high rise architect. [PAWN_pronoun] has an excellent knowledge of engineering.

BackstoryDef.title: Urban planner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an urban planner. [PAWN_pronoun] has an excellent knowledge of construction.

BackstoryDef.title: Settler
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a settler on the outer rim. [PAWN_pronoun] knows a variety of useful skills needed to tame this wild land.

BackstoryDef.title: Warren builder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warren builder on his caveworld home. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to dig homes out of the very earth.

BackstoryDef.title: Tool maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal tool maker. [PAWN_pronoun] has the knowledge to create useful tools.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval blacksmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a medieval blacksmith. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to forge both weapons and armor.

BackstoryDef.title: Roboticist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a roboticist. [PAWN_pronoun] worked on creating complex robots for a variety of different purposes.

BackstoryDef.title: Forger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an urbworld forger. [PAWN_pronoun] can forge a variety of different goods.

BackstoryDef.title: Gunsmith
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gunsmith. [PAWN_pronoun] can forge a variety of different guns.

BackstoryDef.title: Artificer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a caveworld artificer. [PAWN_pronoun] can create a variety of different tools and weapons out of exotic materials.

BackstoryDef.title: Herder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tribal herder. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to tame and take care of animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Stable master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a medieval stable master. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to breed and take care of animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Zoologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a glitterworld zoologist. [PAWN_pronoun] wanders the outer rim documenting the various exotic animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Illegal breeder
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an illegal urbworld breeder. [PAWN_pronoun] bred exotic and dangerous animals for a premium.

BackstoryDef.title: Rancher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is an outer rim rancher. [PAWN_pronoun] breeds and takes care of exotic rimworld animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Mole rat farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a caveworld mole rat farmer. [PAWN_pronoun] bred moles in the depths of the earth to feed [PAWN_possessive] people.

BackstoryDef.title: Tribal warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tribal warrior. [PAWN_pronoun] is fierce looking with [PAWN_possessive] tribal tattoos and [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to use a variety of melee weapons to maim and kill.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a medieval knight. [PAWN_pronoun] believes in chivalry and honor. [PAWN_nameDef] has traveled to the outer rim to obtain the glory [PAWN_pronoun] knows is [PAWN_possessive] destiny.

BackstoryDef.title: Peacekeeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a glitterworld peacekeeper. [PAWN_pronoun] is in charge of keeping the peace all over the galaxy. Right now [PAWN_nameDef] is stationed in the outer rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Riot police
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an urbworld member of the riot police. [PAWN_pronoun] was in charge of ensuring that the people of [PAWN_possessive] urbworld respected the law.

BackstoryDef.title: Bar owner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bar owner in the outer rim. [PAWN_pronoun] knows how to cook and how to crack the occasional raider skull.

BackstoryDef.title: Strike breaker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a strike breaker on the caveworld [PAWN_pronoun] called home. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to both talk [PAWN_possessive] way out of trouble and how to crack some skulls when talking didn't work.
